HediffDef.label: permit authorizer
HediffDef.description: A bionic subpersona core which enables the use of an e-branch's permits even while hostile to it. Whenever a permit authorizer is used in such a way, security systems will temporarily lock the authorizer out of being able to use more permits, for a duration based on the permit's standing cost.

HediffDef.label: gatepuncher
HediffDef.description: A bionic link to a field of skipgates. Enables the use of Skip up to four times, or Emergency Personal Skip up to once.

HediffDef.label: probability tuner
HediffDef.description: A loss of psychic sensitivity caused by bonding with a probability tuner.\n\nProbability tuners drain psychic sensitivity over time, eventually causing a good event. The tuner stops draining sensitivity once either a good event is created or psychic sensitivity reaches 0%.
